title: Moving charges - mass of particle in circular path

content.question: A particle with charge <math alttext="q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>q</mi></math> and initial speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> is traveling through a magnetic field of magnitude <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>B</mi></math>. The particle completes a full circular path in time <math alttext="T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>T</mi></math>. Which of the following is equal to the mass of the particle?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator q v B T, and denominator 2 pi, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>v</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator q B T, and denominator 2 pi, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator q B T, and denominator 2 pi v, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>v</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator q B T, and denominator 2 pi, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>
